Name: Crimson Nights
About the game: Crimson Nights is a multiplayer dungeon crawler, where players try to survive floors of enemies. Players can team up with friends locally or play for themselves in 1 to 4 player action! There are 4 game modes: -A dungeon crawler game mode that players descend infinitely down different dungeons. -A survival mode where players fight in one room against hordes of enemies. -Player vs Player where people can fight each other to decide the best player. -And a floors mode where an objective can be set for players to reach.
Developers: The Crimson Nights Team,Spiky Fish Games
